q: It is useless to meet revenge with revenge; it will heal nothing.
Confidence is not a guarantee of success, but a pattern of thinking that will improve your likelihood of success, a tenacious search for ways to make things work.
Failure is an option, fear is not.
Only the hand that erases can write the true thing.
Victims recite problems, leaders provide solutions.
Here is the test to find whether your mission on earth is finished. If you're alive, it isn't.
Our view of the world is truly shaped by what we decide to hear.
Yesterday is but today's memory, tomorrow is today's dream.
Many people will walk in and out of your life, but only true friends will leave footprints in your heart.
Judgments prevent us from seeing the good that lies beyond appearances.
There is no limit to the amount of good you can do if you don't care who gets the credit.
The first principle of success is desire.
My sun sets to rise again.
Any fool can turn a blind eye but who knows what the ostrich sees in the sand.
Help others for all the times that you have been ignored. Be kind to others, for all the times that you have been scorned.
Those who are enlightened never stop forging themselves.
It is not that we have too little time to do all the things we need to do, it is that we feel the need to do too many things in the time we have.
We create the world and ourselves;
Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
Everybody by your side ain't on your side.
Life is the dancer and you are the dance.
Where focus goes, energy flows.
Fear of death is fear of surrender to Infinity. Learn to surrender, to exist at Infinity while alive, and fear of death dissolves.
Don't learn to do, but learn in doing.
Life is like stepping onto a boat which is about to sail out to sea and sink.
Life is what you make it. Always has been, always will be.
Look to the beauty of this day, miracles are all around you.
To belittle, you have to be little.
Don't let the behavior of others destroy your inner peace.
I think it's very important to have a feedback loop, where you're constantly thinking about what you've done and how you could be doing it better.
There is no sadder sight than a young pessimist.
The worst part of success is trying to find someone who is happy for you.
Belief creates the actual fact.
It's not what we do once in a while that shapes our lives, but what we do consistently.
The first half of life is devoted to forming a healthy ego, the second half is going inward and letting go of it.
The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
Stop being tormented by everyone else's reaction to you.
Simplicity is the glory of expression.
Live the moment for the moment.
A pessimist is one who makes difficulties of his opportunities and an optimist is one who makes opportunities of his difficulties.
The whole world is a series of miracles, but we're so used to them we call them ordinary things.
Do not ignore the passion that burns in you. Spend time to discover your gift.
Scared people want comfort and certainty so they avoid failure. People living fully seek challenges because this is where they feel alive.
Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world; indeed, it's the only thing that ever has.
If you believe you can, you can. If you believe you can't, then, well you can't.
To handle yourself, use your head; to handle others, use your heart.
Don't let the noise of others opinions drown out your inner voice.
Trust thyself: every heart vibrates to that iron string.
Be careful the environment you choose for it will shape you; be careful the friends you choose for you will become like them.
Cleverness is not wisdom.
